parameters.name: NumX
parameters.description: Total number of instances along the x axis, including the seed

parameters.name: NumY
parameters.description: Total number of instances along the y axis, including the seed

parameters.name: SpacingX
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances along the x axis

parameters.name: SpacingY
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances along the y axis

parameters.name: AngleX
parameters.description: Angle for direction 1 relative to the x axis

parameters.name: AngleY
parameters.description: Angle for direction 2 relative to the y axis

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete, passed as a string in the format "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

title: IDrawingDoc.InsertLinearNotePattern
description: Inserts a linear note pattern using the selected note.
signature:
System.Boolean InsertLinearNotePattern( 
   System.Int32
NumX
,
   System.Int32
NumY
,
   System.Double
SpacingX
,
   System.Double
SpacingY
,
   System.Double
AngleX
,
   System.Double
AngleY
,
   System.String
DeleteInstances
)

parameters.name: NumX
parameters.description: Total number of instances along the x axis, including the seed

parameters.name: NumY
parameters.description: Total number of instances along the y axis, including the seed

parameters.name: SpacingX
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances along the x axis

parameters.name: SpacingY
parameters.description: Spacing between pattern instances along the y axis

parameters.name: AngleX
parameters.description: Angle for direction 1 relative to the x axis

parameters.name: AngleY
parameters.description: Angle for direction 2 relative to the y axis

parameters.name: DeleteInstances
parameters.description: Number of instances to delete, passed as a string in the format "( a ) ( b ) ( c ) "

returns: True if the linear note pattern is created, false if not
